room_title: Escape room "The Mysterious Disappearance Of McGregor the Magnificent" by Escape Room Adventures in Fort Myers
review: We had a wonderful time!!! Andrew was fantastic and we solved The Mysterious Disappearance Of McGregor the Magnificent!! The theme and clues were perfect for both the older and younger members in our group, which really made it such a memorable experience for the entire family! we had a group ranging from a first grader to grandparents!!

room_title: Escape room "The Mysterious Disappearance Of McGregor the Magnificent" by Escape Room Adventures in Fort Myers
review: Upon arrival we were greeted politely by Katlynn who was our helper for our room. She was very professional, fun and guided us along our way. Once inside our room, we found the setup, clues and hints very well organized. The mystery was fantastic! Overall this was a very challenging room for our family of 4 which was exactly what we wanted. We didn't escape, but thoroughly enjoyed the experience and would highly recommend Katlynn, this company, and this room.

room_title: Escape room "The Mysterious Disappearance Of McGregor the Magnificent" by Escape Room Adventures in Fort Myers
review: The new Magician's room has some of the coolest puzzles and concepts we've seen so far. It's a really fun room, and I highly recommend it. All of the rooms here are excellent.
